channel.title: Another sponsored server virus/keylogger: Crazed -X
channel.description:
It appears to be a keylogger, so first you need to clean your computer, which you can do so by following these instructions:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529914.0.html
Then, of course, you need to go through and change all your usernames and passwords everywhere you have logged in with since infected.
Make sure you do this right away.
